name: PEZ Play
description:
Welcome to the new and improved world of PEZ Play! Why not drop by and explore all the magic that PEZ has to offer? Discover the thirteen different islands and levels dotted around the globe. Have fun hanging out and take part in loads of games and activities, from challenging puzzles to frantic mini-games!

You can also bring the fun of PEZ to the real world! Use your device's camera to place the PEZ characters next to you, and, while you're at it, snap a photo and share with friends!
Don't forget! You can unlock more fun by scanning PEZ candy codes!
Look out for specially marked PEZ Play candy blisterpacks, then use your device to scan the codes located on an inlay inside the packs! The more you scan, the more magic you unlock!

This application may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- This application may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply.

After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may include data charges.
